VXLIB Function Reference

Channel Combine

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Channel Combine Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/de/df2/group__group__vision__function__channelcombine.html

VXLIB APIs

  • VXLIB_channelCopy_1to1_i8u_o8u : Input (1) and output (1) images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelCombine_2to1_i8u_o8u : Input (2) and output (1) images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelCombine_3to1_i8u_o8u : Input (3) and output (1) images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelCombine_4to1_i8u_o8u : Input (4) and output (1) images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_channelCombine_yuyv_i8u_o8u : Input (3) and output (1) images are U8 format
